body.p: To configure the Schematron options, and go to XML XML Parser Schematron .
The following options are available in this preferences page:

ul.li: Schematron XPath Version - selects the version of XPath for the expressions that are allowed in Schematron assertion tests: 1.0 or 2.0. This option is applied both in standalone Schematron schemas and in embedded Schematron rules, both in Schematron 1.5 and in ISO Schematron;
Use Saxon EE (schema aware) for xslt2 query binding - when enabled, Saxon EE is used for xslt2 query binding. In case this option is disabled, Saxon PE is used.
